item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death ends a life, not a relationship." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "All endings are also beginnings. We just don't know it at the time." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Lost love is still love. It takes a different form, that's all. You can't see their smile or bring them food or tousle their hair or move them around a dance floor. But when those senses weaken another heightens. Memory. Memory becomes your partner. You nurture it. You hold it. You dance with it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "When someone is in your heart, they're never truly gone. They can come back to you, even at unlikely times." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "You see, you closed your eyes. That was the difference. Sometimes you cannot believe what you see, you have to believe what you feel. And if you are ever going to have other people trust you, you must feel that you can trust them, too--even when you’re in the dark. Even when you’re falling." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Have you ever lost someone you love and wanted one more conversation, one more chance to make up for the time when you thought they would be here forever? If so, then you know you can go your whole life collecting days, and none will outweigh the one you wish you had back." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "When you look into your mother’s eyes, you know that is the purest love you can find on this earth." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "But there's a story behind everything. How a picture got on a wall. How a scar got on your face. Sometimes the stories are simple, and sometimes they are hard and heartbreaking. But behind all your stories is always your mother's story, because hers is where yours begin." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Love like rain, can nourish from above, drenching couples with soaking joy. But sometimes, under the angry heat of life, love dries on the surface and must nourish from below, tending to its roots, keeping itself alive." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death doesn't just take someone, it misses someone else, and in the small distance between being taken and being missed, lives are changed." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "I also believe that parents, if they love you, will hold you up safely, above their swirling waters, and sometimes that means you'll never know what they endured, and you may treat them unkindly, in a way you otherwise wouldn't." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "The truth is, when our mothers held us, rocked us, stroked our heads -none of us ever got enough of that. We all yearn in some way to return to those days when we were completely taken care of - unconditional love, unconditional attention. Most of us didn't get enough." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "She put one hand on mine. “When someone is in your heart, they’re never truly gone. They can come back to you, even at unlikely times." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Deana add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "...You can go your whole life collecting days, and none will outweigh the one you wish you had back." -- Mitch Albom
